description: 001. AU - Payment Method: Should save bank details if valid details are given for SWIFT
expectedMessage: Bank details saved

description: 002. AU - Payment Method: Should save bank details if valid details are given for LOCAL
expectedMessage: Bank details saved

description: 003. AU - Payment Method: Should return error if payment method has no value
expectedMessage: 'payment_method' field required, the value should be either 'LOCAL' or 'SWIFT'

description: 004. AU - Payment Method: Should return error if payment method SWIFT is in lowercase
expectedMessage: 'payment_method' field required, the value should be either 'LOCAL' or 'SWIFT'

description: 005. AU - Payment Method: Should return error if payment method LOCAL is in lowercase
expectedMessage: 'payment_method' field required, the value should be either 'LOCAL' or 'SWIFT'

description: 006. AU - Payment Method: Should return error if payment method is neither LOCAL or SWIFT
expectedMessage: 'payment_method' field required, the value should be either 'LOCAL' or 'SWIFT'

description: 020.  - Bank Country Code: Should return error if bank_country_code is blank
expectedMessage: 'bank_country_code' is required, and should be one of 'US', 'AU', or 'CN'
